ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of NATHAN DAVID FERGUSON of London, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 16, 2021.
